title: Gluten free walnut and date loaf
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon oil (for greasing cake tin)', '125g raw walnuts, roughly chopped', '135g pitted dates, chopped', '150g organic honey', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt', '125ml very hot filtered tap water', 'a few drops rosewater (optional)', '2 eggs, lightly beaten', '1 1/2 teaspoons natural vanilla extract', '75g white rice flour', '75g brown rice flour', '75g potato starch', '1 teaspoon xanthan gum']
